entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning early this afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Fog patches this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 then light after midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023
